meanings.definition: To remove furniture from a space.
meanings.sent1: I will start disfurnishing the living room to make space for the new sofa.
meanings.sent2: She spent the weekend disfurnishing the old house before moving out.
meanings.sent3: The disfurnishing process turned into a fun game of rearranging the rooms.
meanings.sent4: Disfurnishing the office felt like stripping away unnecessary layers of clutter.
meanings.sent5: The sound of disfurnishing echoed through the empty house, signaling a fresh start.

meanings.definition: The act of depriving a space of furniture.
meanings.sent1: The disfurnishing of the hotel room left it feeling cold and empty.
meanings.sent2: After the disfurnishing, the room looked surprisingly spacious.
meanings.sent3: The disfurnishing of the classroom led to creative seating arrangements on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The disfurnishing of the stage created a minimalist backdrop for the performance.
meanings.sent5: His passion for disfurnishing stemmed from a desire for simplicity and openness in spaces.
